item.title: Sen. Jeff Merkley delivers marathon speech protesting Trump's policies
item.description: Democratic Sen. Jeff Merkley began delivering a marathon speech Tuesday evening, speaking overnight and into the morning Wednesday in protest of Presi...

item.title: School in Sweden locked down after suspected hand grenades discovered
item.description: Swedish media say a school attended by about 800 students was locked down after two suspected grenades were found nearby.

item.title: Government shutdown becomes second-longest in history on Day 22
item.description: The government shutdown is now the second-longest funding lapse in modern history, stretching into Day 22 on Wednesday. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Democratic senator gives marathon speech ahead of 12th vote on funding bill
item.description: The Senate is set to vote for a 12th time to reopen the government as the shutdown becomes the second-longest funding lapse in U.S. history. Before th...

item.title: Group of unlikely allies seeking ban on AI "superintelligence"
item.description: There arfe many big names in a group of unlikely allies seeking a ban, for now, on AI "superintelligence" they say could threaten humanity.
